entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning early in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
